articles.author: Joan Biskupic, CNN legal analyst & Supreme Court biographer
articles.title: Samuel Alito's viral speech signals where conservative Supreme Court is headed
articles.description: There's no secret to what Supreme Court Justice Samuel Alito wants for the law in America. He said it out loud Thursday night in an ireful speech to the conservative Federalist Society.

articles.author: Kara Scannell
articles.title: Arizona presidential election: Trump campaign drops lawsuit demanding a review of ballots
articles.description: Lawyers for the Trump campaign have dropped a lawsuit seeking a review of all ballots cast on Election Day after finding that the margin of victory for the presidential contest in Arizona could not be overcome.
articles.content: (CNN)Lawyers for the Trump campaign have dropped a lawsuit seeking a review of all ballots cast on Election Day after finding that the margin of victory for the presidential contest in Arizona could … [+509 chars]

articles.author: Dr. Sanjay Gupta Chief Medical Correspondent
articles.title: Dr. Sanjay Gupta: The pandemic has become a humanitarian disaster in the United States
articles.description: As this pandemic unfolds in the United States, I now count it among the worst humanitarian disasters I've covered. I never thought I would feel that sense of loss and suffering about my own country.

articles.author: Simone Pathe, Renée Rigdon and Janie Boschma, CNN
articles.title: A record number of women will serve in the next Congress
articles.description: At least 141 women will serve in Congress next year, breaking the record of 127 set in 2019, according to data from the Center for American Women and Politics at Rutgers University, with outstanding races still to be called by CNN.
articles.content:
By Simone Pathe, Renée Rigdon and Janie Boschma, CNN

articles.author: Jeff Zeleny, Senior Washington Correspondent
articles.title: Biden to take deliberative approach to filling Cabinet
articles.description: President-elect Joe Biden will spend Friday and the weekend considering potential nominees to his Cabinet, aides said, but they cautioned that any major announcements were not expected to take place in the coming days.

articles.author: Anneken Tappe, CNN Business
articles.title: Trump's Fed pick finally nears confirmation despite unorthodox views
articles.description: Nearly a year after being nominated, President Donald Trump's controversial Federal Reserve board nominee is now within striking distance of being confirmed by Senate Republicans, despite warnings from across the political spectrum about her unorthodox views.

articles.author: Opinion by Daryl Austin
articles.title: Anti-maskers: A group of people whining so much over something so little
articles.description: Daryl Austin writes about the rapid spread of Covid-19 in Utah and reflects on how, for Utah's anti-maskers, logic and reason have been replaced by misinformation -- setting the stage for potentially catastrophic consequences in the state.
articles.content: Daryl Austin is an independent journalist based in Utah. His work has appeared in The New York Times, The Wall Street Journal, Psychology Today, NBC News and The Washington Post. The opinions express… [+6652 chars]

articles.author: Brian Fung and Sherisse Pham, CNN Business
articles.title: TikTok granted two more weeks to reach a deal for US business
articles.description: After seemingly blowing past the Trump administration's deadline for TikTok to find a new owner, the US government has quietly given the embattled social media platform a reprieve.

articles.title: Medical journal editor shares his key concern for Covid-19 vaccines
articles.description: CNN's Becky Anderson speaks with Richard Horton, editor-in-chief of The Lancet, about the development of vaccines for the novel coronavirus.

articles.title: Opinion: America, we've missed you. Now please get your act together on climate change

articles.title: King responds to Navarro: Part of a circle of sycophants
articles.description: White House trade adviser Peter Navarro said on Fox Business that the White House is under the "assumption of a second Trump term," and that President Trump "won the election," even though he has lost.

articles.author: Kaitlan Collins, Kate Bennett and Betsy Klein, CNN
articles.title: Several dozen USSS officers sidelined due to coronavirus exposure
articles.description: In the aftermath of the final sprint of the 2020 election season, many Secret Service officers have been sidelined due to the pandemic.

articles.title: Harry Styles becomes Vogue's first-ever solo male cover star
articles.description: Harry Styles just added another accolade to his growing list of achievements. Starring on the cover of US Vogue's December 2020 issue, he is the first man to front the fashion title solo.

articles.title: Mohamed Salah tests positive for coronavirus, Egyptian Football Association says

articles.author: Matt Egan, CNN Business
articles.title: SEC charges former Wells Fargo executives over fake-accounts scandal
articles.description: The Securities and Exchange Commission on Friday charged former Wells Fargo CEO John Stumpf and a top lieutenant with misleading investors about the success of the division at the heart of the bank's fake-account scandal.

articles.author: Karol Brinkley, CNN
articles.title: Must-watch videos of the week
articles.description: A backyard roller coaster, a high-speed ride through the desert, and a royal surprise for a young girl. These are the videos you don't want to miss this week.
